channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: マンディアント：中国のPR会社がニュースワイヤー・サービスを利用して、ピッツバーグ・ポスト・ガゼット（ワシントン・ポスト）を含む32以上の米国ニュースメディアのサブドメインに親北コンテンツを掲載した。
item.description:
Washington Post:
Mandiant: a Chinese PR firm used newswire services to place pro-Beijing content on the subdomains of 32+ US news outlets, including the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette  —  Welcome to The Cybersecurity 202!  Tim here.  If you're remotely interested in boxing, or maybe even if you aren't, you'll definitely want to be watching Saturday night.

item.title: NPRは、エディス・チャピンをニュース担当SVP兼編集長に指名した。彼女は2012年にNPRに入社後、2022年秋から同職を代理で務めていた（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
NPR names Edith Chapin as its SVP for news and editor-in-chief; she's been serving in the position on an acting basis since fall 2022, after joining NPR in 2012  —  NPR has moved to shore up its leadership at a time of significant transition, naming veteran news leader Edith Chapin …

item.title: 情報筋MLSシーズンパス、シーズンチケット所有者を含め100万人に迫る勢い、チーム幹部は視聴率統計の透明性不足に不満と語る（Sports Business Journal）
item.description:
Sports Business Journal:
Sources: MLS Season Pass is nearing 1M subs including season-ticket holders; team execs say they are frustrated due to lack of transparency in viewership stats  —  Apple's Eddy Cue began speaking to a room filled with MLS owners and executives last week in Washington, D.C. …

item.title: 情報筋ディズニーは2023年以降の映画公開スケジュールを見直しており、ストライキを起こした俳優が映画の宣伝に協力しないため、いくつかのタイトルを延期する可能性がある（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Sources: Disney is reviewing its film release schedule for the rest of 2023 and may delay some titles because striking actors won't help promote the pictures  —  The discussions are at an early stage, but could impact films including Poor Things, Next Goal Wins, Wish and Magazine Dreams, which are all slated for release this year.

item.title: Viceの財務上の苦境と資金調達の経緯が法廷文書で明らかに。Viceは2023年5月に8億3400万ドルの負債を抱え、2017年以降、負債と株式で13億ドル以上の資金を調達（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Court docs reveal Vice's financial struggles and fundraising history; Vice held $834M in debt in May 2023, raising $1.3B+ in debt and equity funding since 2017  —  New documents reveal a yearslong slide into increasing financial desperation  —  The digital media company Vice filed …

item.title: TikTokがテキスト投稿のサポートを開始、アプリのCameraページから利用でき、ユーザーは音、場所、ステッカーなどを追加できる（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
TikTok rolls out support for text posts, available via the app's Camera page and letting users add sounds, locations, stickers, and more  —  As Twitter shoots itself in the foot with a rebrand this morning, TikTok has announced that it's rolling out support for text posts.

item.title: 1868年から新聞を発行し、ピューリッツァー賞も受賞したサンタバーバラ・ニュース・プレス紙が休刊、連邦破産法第7章の適用を申請（Jean Yamamura/The Santa Barbara ...）
item.description:
Jean Yamamura / The Santa Barbara Independent:
The Santa Barbara News-Press, which has published a paper since 1868 and received a Pulitzer, ceases publication and files for a Chapter 7 bankruptcy  —  Publisher Ampersand Claims Few Assets and Many Creditors  —  More than 150 years of history ended on Friday when the Santa Barbara News …

item.title: 大ヒットを記録した『バーベンハイマー』のオープニング週末興収は、バービーが1億5,500万ドル、オッペンハイマーが8,050万ドルで、アメリカとカナダで合計3億ドルを稼ぎ出し、4度目の快挙となった（Lisa Richwine/ロイター）。
item.description:
Lisa Richwine / Reuters:
The much-hyped “Barbenheimer” opening weekend netted $155M for Barbie and $80.5M for Oppenheimer, for $300M in total in the US and Canada for just the 4th time  —  The much-hyped “Barbenheimer” box office battle over the weekend proved to be a win for movie theaters that needed to add some sizzle to their summer.

item.title: 情報筋Altice USAがCheddar Newsの売却とその他の戦略的選択肢を模索中、Altice USAは2019年にストリーミングニュースネットワークを$200Mで買収（New York Times）
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Altice USA is exploring a sale and other strategic options for Cheddar News; Altice USA acquired the streaming news network for $200M in 2019  —  Rebranding the social network as X marks the billionaire's latest gamble to reinvent the company, after buying it last year for $44 billion.

item.title: 社内メモ：WBDのロバート・ブレア国際TV配給社長が「必要な構造改革」のため25年ぶりに退社予定（Jesse Whittock/Deadline）
item.description:
Jesse Whittock / Deadline:
Internal memo: WBD President of International TV Distribution Robert Blair plans to leave the company after 25 years due to a “necessary structural change”  —  Warner Bros Discovery President of International TV Distribution Robert Blair is leaving after 25 years with the company.

item.title: 1989年に海外特派員としてBBCに入局し、過去20年間「BBC News at Six」を担当したBBCニュースリーダー、ジョージ・アラギアが67歳で死去。
item.description:
BBC:
BBC newsreader George Alagiah, who joined the broadcaster as a foreign correspondent in 1989 and presented BBC News at Six for the past 20 years, dies at 67  —  George Alagiah, one of the BBC's longest-serving and most respected journalists, has died at 67, nine years after being diagnosed with cancer.

item.title: Spotify、US Premiumを9.99ドルから月額10.99ドルに値上げを確認、2011年のUSローンチ以来初の値上げ、Duoは2ドル、FamilyとStudentは1ドル値上げ（Jon Porter/The Verge）
item.description:
Jon Porter / The Verge:
Spotify confirms raising US Premium to $10.99/month, up from $9.99, the first increase since its US launch in 2011; Duo rises by $2, Family and Student by $1  —  After 12 years, the price of Spotify Premium is increasing in the US.  The subscription will now cost $10.99 a month, the company announced today.

item.title: ノースウエスト準州で唯一の完全オンライン・ニュース組織であるキャビン・ラジオのようなカナダの小規模ニュース局は、オンライン・ニュース法の影響を心配している（ナタリー・プレスマン/CBCニュース）。
item.description:
Natalie Pressman / CBC News:
Canada's smaller news outlets, like Cabin Radio, the Northwest Territories' only entirely-online news organization, worry about the Online News Act's impact  —  ‘Obviously we will take as many steps as we can to protect our interests,’ said Cabin editor Ollie Williams

item.title: Twitter、週末のイーロン・マスクの発表を受けて、象徴的な鳥の代わりに "暫定的な "Xのロゴを更新、X.comはtwitter.comにリダイレクトされる（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Twitter rolls out its updated “interim” X logo, replacing the iconic bird, following Elon Musk's weekend announcement; X.com now redirects to twitter.com  —  Twitter has removed the iconic bird logo and adopted ‘X’ as its official logo.  This move comes after Elon Musk announced the change over the weekend.

item.title: トルコのソフトパワーを拡大しようとする国営放送TRTは、当初は国内向けに制作されたトルコの番組を世界展開の最前線に据えている（Patrick Sykes/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Patrick Sykes / Bloomberg:
Turkish shows, initially made for domestic audiences, are at the forefront of state broadcaster TRT's global expansion, as Turkey tries to extend its soft power  —  - New state streaming site brings drone wars to global viewers  — Government backs TV export drive worth up to $1.5 billion
